tasks.label: Wallet 1
tasks.command: cargo run --bin xelis_wallet --release -- --network dev --wallet-path ./wallets/dev_1 --password test --rpc-username test --rpc-password test --rpc-bind-address 127.0.0.1:8081 --precomputed-tables-l1 24 --seed 'etched copy copy yahoo pairing rated pause apart rafts motherly rekindle twice tequila soccer jogger rarest delayed bovine orchid tavern ferry aplomb pairing pivot twice'
